name: Unsung Empires: The Cholas
description:
In this single-player, narrative-driven 3D action game, you will take on the role of Rajendra Chola, one of the most powerful kings of Tamil Nadu. You will experience the rich lore of the Chola dynasty within this prologue. Fight your way as Rajendra Chola with swords, engage in melee combat, and use stealth to overcome hostile enemies. Your journey will traverse different environments of Srivijaya, such as its forests, cities, caves, and wilderness. These elements will advance the game’s story. The prologue follows his journey of overseas conquest, where the Chola Navy crossed the ocean and launched an attack on the Srivijaya kingdom of Sangrama Vijayatungavarman.

Prologue Part 1 releasing on 15th January 2024!


We are releasing “Unsung Empires: The Cholas Prologue 1” which drops on January 15, 2024. Building on that, we've got Part 2 coming your way in March of the same year.

Enjoy Beautifully-Crafted Graphics, Authentic Music, and Detailed Environments


Marvel at the beautifully crafted graphics that bring ancient India to life with realistic lighting, shadows, and textures. Listen to authentic music that captures the mood and spirit of each scene. Experience detailed environments that are filled with ambient sounds, dynamic weather effects, and wildlife.

Wield Your Sword and Master Powerful Combat Techniques


Fight your way through a world of danger and intrigue using swords/bows and stealthy maneuvers—master powerful combat techniques inspired by ancient Tamil martial arts. Face off against hostile enemies, including the Sri Vijaya soldiers who will stop at nothing to defend their king.

Experience a Compelling Story


Embark on an Epic Journey of Conquest and Adventure Step into the shoes of Rajendra Chola, the warrior king of the Chola Empire, as he faces his greatest challenge yet. The Srivijaya king Sangrama has blocked his trade route and threatened his sovereignty, and he must teach him a lesson he will never forget. Along the way, he will meet allies, enemies, friends, & foes and discover secrets and mysteries that will change his destiny. Will he restore the glory of his empire, or will he pay a heavy price for his ambition?

A Taste Of What’s to Come


This game will span over 10 chapters, telling a different story that we haven’t revealed yet. This pilot chapter is a prologue that covers the Srivijaya empire, where Rajendra Chola sets out to teach a lesson to the Srivijaya king Sangrama. This chapter will set the stage for the main game, which will take you to a different time and place. You will get to explore more of the rich and diverse culture of the Cholas and Tamil and experience more thrilling and immersive gameplay. We’re giving this pilot chapter for free, so you can get a taste of what’s to come. We hope you’ll enjoy it and buy and play the remaining chapters.
